body.p: Green County, Kentucky, farmer. South Carolina native. Married to Rebecca Hawk Akridge. Father of Malvina Akridge, Elijah Akridge, Mary Akridge, Samuel Akridge, and Martha Akridge. Farmer in Green County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Green County in 1860.
